title: race detector: relocation error
body:
I can no longer use the race detector.

bradfitz@bradfitz:~/go/src/pkg/net/http$ go test -race
/tmp/go-build777326335/net/http/_test/http.test: relocation error:
/tmp/go-build777326335/net/http/_test/http.test: symbol sysconf, version GLIBC_2.2.5 not
defined in file libpthread.so.0 with link time reference
exit status 127
FAIL    net/http        0.001s

bradfitz@bradfitz:~/go/src/pkg/net/http$ hg id
a78557354dc0+ tip

bradfitz@bradfitz:~/go/src/pkg/net/http$ uname -a

GNU/Linux
